title: Marketing Executive
text:
Marketing Executive
[Bell Cornwall Recruitment](/company-profile/Bell-Cornwall-Recruitment-42495)
Marketing Executive
Birmingham City Centre
£30,000 - £40,000
Bell Cornwall are delighted to be working with an award-winning national law firm who are looking for a Marketing Executive to join the business at an exciting time. This is a sole, number one role in which the Marketing Executive will manage all aspects of the marketing function varying from digital marketing, social media engagement, events, and more.
The duties and responsibilities for the Marketing Executive include (but are not limited to):
- Sole responsibility for the firm's digital marketing and social media platforms
- Regular analytical work around PPC marketing and SEO to inform strategy
- Co-ordinating and marketing general firm-wide events
- Assist with the creation, development, and maintenance of an in-house CRM system
- Ensure continual brand awareness and consistency across all marketing materials
The Ideal Candidate:
- Experience and an existing knowledge of the legal sector would be extremely desirable
- Exposure to a wide range of different forms of marketing
- Proactive nature with an eye for strategy
- Exemplary communication and IT skills
- Ability to travel into the office 5 days a week
This is a new role which will give the right type of person autonomy to stamp their own identity on the position and the chance to progress with the business who are known for rewarding and retaining their staff in their absolutely beautiful city centre office.
Interested? Please click the 'APPLY' button now!
BCR aim to get back to all successful applicants within 24 hours however if you have not received a response within this period then it may be that your application has been unsuccessful.
